keyEvents.description: Luffy attacks Enel with Gomu Gomu no Rifle, damaging the golden wall of the ark
keyEvents.significance: Shows the ark's structure can be damaged by strong physical attacks

keyEvents.description: Enel melts part of the golden wall to create the golden ball trap for Luffy
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the ark's gold can be weaponized by Enel

keyEvents.description: Luffy falls from the ark after losing his grip
keyEvents.significance: Creates a critical turning point in the battle as Luffy is removed from the ark

keyEvents.description: Sanji and Usopp hook their grappling device onto the lower deck and begin climbing
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the rescue mission subplot

keyEvents.description: Nami prepares to fight Enel on the ark's deck
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the setting for the upcoming Nami vs. Enel battle

keyEvents.description: Aisa and others on the ground witness Luffy falling from the Ark Maxim
keyEvents.significance: Provides ground-level perspective on the aerial battle

keyEvents.description: Residents learn of Enel's plan to destroy their homeland using the Ark Maxim
keyEvents.significance: Raises the stakes for all of Skypiea's inhabitants

keyEvents.description: Sanji and Usopp depart from the ship to rescue Nami
keyEvents.significance: The ship serves as the launching point for the rescue mission
